moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Mai
characters.description: stoic, indifferent, in love with Zuko like the rest of us are

moves.name: Flaming Dagger
moves.description: Mai engages in close combat with a small firey dagger

moves.name: Piercing Glare
moves.description: Mai focuses all of her supressed rage into her gaze and shoots out a concentrated beam of light that burns the skin

moves.name: Scoff
moves.description: Mai displays an air of judgement, harming her opponent's resolve

moves.name: Hot Hair Pins
moves.description: Mai attacks her opponent with burning hot hair pins

new moves.name: Meteor
new moves.description: Aang summons a firey comet from the sky
